emptyLocation.title: No location drawn
emptyLocation.message: {entityType} will not display on maps until a location is added

populatedLocation.title: Add another location?
populatedLocation.message: Select the drawing tool again to add more locations (up to {maxLocations}).

maximumPoints.title: Maximum points reached ({currentCount}/{maxLocations})
maximumPoints.message: To add more locations: delete points, or edit lines and areas to delete their points (right click).

maximumLocations.title: Maximum locations reached
maximumLocations.message: To add more locations, remove one or more, or remove all locations and use a more general area.
